reasoning: Chronic degenerative condition measured as prevalence. Symptomatic disc degeneration affects approximately 8.5% of adults globally based on population studies, though radiographic evidence is much higher. Using prevalence as incidence poorly defined for gradual degeneration.
source: Hartvigsen J et al. (2018). What low back pain is and why we need to pay attention. Lancet. 391(10137):2356-2367
